Room for one, two if necessary. 
Access road suitable for smaller vehicles. Steep, bumpy and  loose gravel. Should be okay with a van.
Very quiet day and night. only saw one person in 24h.

No real shade, no services.

nice atmosphere.

title: (08870) Sitges - 85 Passeig Marítim
description:
Longitudinal parking spaces on a dead end street that leads to a hotel. It is a blue zone for which you have to pay during the day (see photo). There are no signs that parking for mobile homes is prohibited and the police, who constantly make patrols, have said nothing.
I downloaded the parking app (QR code on the parking column) for parking and was able to easily extend the parking space from a distance.
As already mentioned, it is a dead end, which is why it is extremely quiet.
The small tourist train also leaves right next door and you can travel along the entire beach to the busier part at the other end of the bay.
There are also showers on the beach and if you go to one of the beach bars you can also use their toilets.
All in all a top place for day and night.

title: (08734) Moja -
description: On the side of a road, cars pass often but you sleep well. the area is level and wide enough for two or three cars. it's not a big deal but there are routes and some nice views

title: (08734) - BV-2443
description: Parking of the museum of the castle of Olerdola, open 24 hours a day and at the time of the museum services, spectacular view of the Penedés

title: (08870) Sitges - 5 Carrer Doctor Fleming
description: A blue zone site. There is a caretaker in the building. Very safe and quiet.

title: (08870) Sitges - Carrer Cristóbal Colón
description: Jardins Terramar. It is a public park with pine trees that provide shade. There are benches and picnic tables perfect for a break. There are also public toilets, a park for children to play, table tennis and soccer goals.

name: Camping Sitges
title: (08870) Camping Sitges
description: Very pleasant campsite. Swimming pool, restaurant, mini market. Shaded, free wifi, very clean toilets. Close to the city center.

title: (08870) Sitges - 6 Carrer Josep Vicenç Foix
description: Very good place to spend the day and night, in low season, it starts at the end of October: it is totally free, easily 30 places within the blue lines.

title_short: (43713) Sant Jaume dels Domenys - 35 Carrer de Sant Antoni

description: Residential area with ample parking very quiet

title: (08870) Sitges - 17 Avinguda Salvador Casacuberta
description: Parking in residential area. Wide street, little traveled and with trees that give shade. Very close to the beach and the promenade.

title: (08870) Sitges - 13 Carrer Josep Carner
description: Sitges.. A quiet street otherwise no open campsite.  The municipality should think of a real area to avoid the street. This parking lot, out of season, I suppose borders the terramar park. Carrer, Christofol Colomb.

title: (43716) Albinyana - Unnamed Road
description:
Small dirt parking lot next to the hermitage, super quiet to sleep. It is not recommended to take a very long motorhome or large volume as you have to cross inside the town and the streets are a bit narrow. It is in a privileged area at the top of the town of Albinyana on the mountain with little light pollution. We have seen the best Perseid rains there. From the parking lot you can see the coast and the
sunrise.

title: (08810) Sant Pere de Ribes - 3 Carrer Nou
title_short: (08810) Sant Pere de Ribes - 3 Carrer Nou

title: (08870) Sitges - 14 Carrer Mestre Manel Torrens
description: Large parking spaces, very quiet until 7 a.m.

title: (08870) Sitges - 17 Carrer Antoni Muntañola
description: Parking without services and without being regulated, it is not paid. Some traffic noise but it did not bother us . 500 meters from the beach.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 6 Camí Barà
description: Parking by the beach and SNCF track. Very good for the day at night you can hear the trains. can help out if the Arc de la Barca campsite is full. Access to the campsite restaurant is nearby.

title: (08730) Els Monjos - 6 Carrer Lluís Companys
description: RV Penedès area - Santa Margarida and Monjos els Public area easily accessible from the AP7 and the N-340. This place in the Penedès is part of the Parque del Foix natural space, from which several hiking routes are offered. It is also worth visiting the Molí del Foix, the castle of Penyafort or the CIARGA. Don't miss the weekly Sunday market. The area, which together with 11 other areas belongs to the RV Penedès, is equipped with drinking water supply and discharge of gray and black water. 12 estates that will bring you closer to the beauty of the Penedès.

name: Camping Arc de Bará
title: (43883) Camping Arc de Bará
description: Camping Arc de Bara, friendly welcome, very clean sanitary, located 100 m from the sea.

title: (43884) Bonastre -
description: Small corner above the road sheltered from view, very easy to access, next to an electric pilone, flat. At the entry of a private property, be careful not to obstruct the entrance. We spent the night there without problem, the road can be busy, very quiet. And don't forget, nature welcomes us so let's respect it. Pick up your waste.

title: (08870) Sitges - 3 Carrer Antoni Muntañola
description: In the square, in front of the Church, there is a park where we have been able to eat in the shade. There is a public fountain. In addition you can park around and we believe that sleeping without problems too. There is no indication that prohibits the overnight stay. Beach nearby with shower and toilet.

title: (43713) Sant Jaume dels Domenys -
description: Parking area next to the road. There is a small blind path that allows to have a little shade next to the trees. It is next to a road with very little traffic and there is only room for one vehicle

title: (08732) Castellví de la Marca - 8 Carrer Salvador Morato
title_short: (08732) Castellví de la Marca - 8 Carrer Salvador Morato
description: Very quiet parking overlooking the vinyas. Skate area. Playground nearby. Bar.restaurante.panadería. Motorhome workshop. All close within town. You can start the route to see the vineyard environment and in the background you can see the mountain with its tower on top. In the motorhome workshop you can buy liquid for toilet and since you buy it, it lets you fill the water tank.

name: Stel Camping & Bungalows Resort
title: (43883) Stel Camping & Bungalows Resort
description: Camping Stel A family campsite by the sea. Very clean toilets with all services. Very friendly staff. We only spent one night calling half an hour before arriving, being a bit late (9pm) they treated us very well. Recommendable.

title: (08810) Sant Pere de Ribes - 2A Carrer Joan Cuadras
title_short: (08810) Sant Pere de Ribes - 2A Carrer Joan Cuadras
description: Dead end next to a sports center, very large parking lot, very quiet place to sleep

title: (08732) La Múnia - 1 Carrer de Montserrat
description: New area for MOTORHOMES in La Múnia. Drinking water and gray water area. No shade (trees will be planted soon). 2 tables with benches. Beautiful views of the Penedès. Routes in Castellví de la Marca. There is a municipal swimming pool nearby, a skate park (soon paddle tennis courts), a bar, a supermarket, other shops and a bakery. Also a Sabadell bank in the center of town. In the town there is a campers workshop and other mechanics and services. GPS: Castellvi de la Marca 08732. Enter the town, towards the municipal swimming pool. Direct GPS commands more complicated roads. Enter LA MUNIA town, look for a swimming pool/school and on the last street is the NEW AC area.

title: (08870) Sitges - 116 Passeig de Vilanova
description: Space at side of the road set back a bit for about 3 campers. There are spaces all along the road too if this is full. No services but close to beach and 3 of us stayed here for 2 nights no problem.

title: (08870) Sitges - 64 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet
title_short: (08870) Sitges - 64 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet
description: FREE parking on residential street, just outside the Blue (paid) parking zone. We stayed for 4 nights, no problem. Short walk to beach, 10 minutes to restaurants and shops.

address.street: 64 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet

title: (08870) Sitges - 2 Carrer Reverendo Joan Lloveras
description: Blue zone street. Very quiet place, next to the beach. One-way road parking. A short walk from the center. No services other than the showers on the beach.

title: (08870) Sitges - 123 Passeig de Vilanova
description: Possibility of parking next to an avenue. It is free and you can spend the night. It is 4 blocks from the beach. as negative is that a lot of vehicles pass and there is a lot of noise to sleep.

title: (08734) Barcelona - C-15z
description: A career entry that must be enjoyed only weekends ... The passage of some bikes and very few cars if we omit the four tracks 200 meters but in the corner we did not find better!

title: (08870) Sitges - 27 Lloc Casalot
description: Just for a night stopover if the local campsites are overbooked. Busy street and area under construction in the morning from 8:30. Alone with children, we seemed sure. We spent 2 nights here and took advantage of Sitges train station to get to Barcelona.

title: (43884) La Vinya de Bonastre - Unnamed Road
title_short: (43884) La Vinya de Bonastre - Unnamed Road
description: Nice little place to spend a night, view of the sea and the city, we were 2 DEFENDERS and had a great night.

title: (08870) Sitges - 27 Passeig Marítim
description: Paid parking in the blue zone from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. and from 4 p.m. to 8 p.m. We cannot pay more than 3 hours in a row otherwise you have to come back to put an extra 1 hour (time stamp), especially put the ticket visible on the windshield. The police drove by several times without even looking at us. Otherwise beautiful view of the Mediterranean. Quiet despite the busy road. All commerce nearby with the center of Sitges.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 7 Carrer Tarragonès
description: Huge esplanade attached to the center of the city, the most commercial area of the town. The Police pass many times during the night. Containers next door, soccer field, good coverage. During the day it is filled with cars of people who go to the center, at night you are practically alone. Highly lit areas. We rested great, very calm. It's not a big deal but in the center and safe.

title: (08870) Sitges - 44 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet
title_short: (08870) Sitges - 44 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet
description:
Free parking day and night just 2 minutes from the beach.
There are additional parking spaces in the streets behind.
Street is busy but we slept very well.

address.street: 44 Avinguda de Nostra Senyora del Vinyet

title: (08734) Barcelona -
description: Beautiful place to park there is a closed sign from 11pm to 8am.

title: (08870) Sitges - 90 Lloc Can Bort
description: Close to town, easy to find, free. We are 10 motorhomes, quiet.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 28 Carrer Moncayo
description:
Parking near the sea and free
no service but close to the CC area where you can go 1 night for services

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 9 Passeig Marítim
description: Super parking for vans by the beach, restaurant bar refreshment bar

title: (43884) Bonastre - Carrer del Sagrat
description: Small corner surrounded by nature in the mountains, 15 minutes from the beach. Possibility of putting two vans See more? perfect for a quiet night and a beautiful sunrise. On the other hand, there is no shadow.

title: (43884) Bonastre - Carrer del Sagrat
description:
Little sidestop on a gravy road before a dead end (not for a vey big vehicle). Right under a big electric pole so easy to find, makes some noise of electricity passing in the cables but we got used to it after 10 minutes, really no big deal.
Beautiful mountains view around and sky full of stars good visible as not much light pollution in the area :)

name: Area 340
title: (43839) Area 340
description: Private, quiet area, with 2 shaded areas and one sunny area on the beach. All pitches with electricity. Bar / cafeteria service. Open all year long.

title: (43884) Bonastre - Unnamed Road
description:
Now this is what I call remote.. Just mountains and zizikies around in the woods.. Awesome if you want to run away from civilisation :) 
Great hiking tract beside. Could accommodate up to 6 camper vans but not too wide vehicles as road is rough to get here.

title: (08870) Barcelona - 10 Carrer de Felip Font i Falp
title_short: (08870) Barcelona - 10 Carrer de Felip Font i Falp
description: Long parking bays (especially good for large vehicles) on a busy road, close to the center. Extremely many places free despite Sunday. We stayed here for at least two nights and no one complained.

address.street: 10 Carrer de Felip Font i Falp

title: (43884) Bonastre - Carrer del Sagrat
description: It‘s not easy to find accessible parking for a big vehicle in this park. We found this clean spot on the side of a very quiet but paved side road, surrounded by nature, hiking/jogging trails, and mysterious caves. We loved it. It was also easy to rotate the caravan on the spot when leaving. Be aware, one caravan takes up almost the entire room available, maybe another van would fit, but no more.

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 1 Carrer de la Font
title_short: (43883) Roda de Berà - 1 Carrer de la Font
description: Cinder parking next to the school

title: (08870) Sitges - 20-22 Carrer Víctor Balaguer
description: Drinking water fountain and outdoor training park (calisthenics)

title: (08734) Moja - 3 Carrer de l'Era
description: Quiet and secure parking with great views of the Penedes

title: (43883) Roda de Berà - 4 Carrer Comerç
description: Picnic tables and benches.

title: (08870) Sitges - 8V Passeig de Ronda
description: Free parking for the day to visit or stay at the beach.

title: (43884) Bonastre -
description: Large concrete slab across from the graveyard. No signs prohibiting camping. Probably the best spot in the area. Water fountain in the town nearby

title: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès -
description: Highway rest area. Ideal to stop to eat with tables and shade.

title: (43839) Creixell - 57 Carrer del Mercat
description: Self-service laundry. Hours until 8:30 p.m.

title: (43839) Port Romà - 87 Avinguda del Mar
description: Parking by the sea in Platja de Creixell. Parking for C.C. prohibited at night. Good for a lunch stop.

description: Camping sirena dorada de creixell, a perfect campsite to come with the little ones

description: Esplanade of terra ben leveled prop of the road i of the collegi del poble. Aprop d'un restaurant

title: (08870) Sitges - s/n Carrer Pintor Marià Carbonellopis
title_short: (08870) Sitges - s/n Carrer Pintor Marià Carbonellopis
description: This is the parking of sports facilities, has a part which can contain more than 50 vehicles. The night is quiet and almost empty

title: (08732) Castellví de la Marca - Unnamed Road
title_short: (08732) Castellví de la Marca - Unnamed Road
description: Esplanade near the road. Very quiet place, with a lot of space, without services. Access point for excursions.

title: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 24 Avinguda Ronda de Mar
title_short: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 24 Avinguda Ronda de Mar
description: SPEED QUEEN automatic laundry. EESS. BY ENERGY - Ronda de Mar, 24 (next to Mercadona) Large Parking. Washing machine and Dryer. Schedule will depart. 365 days. 08:00 to 22:00. Also toilets free in the supermarket entrance, large car/van washing

title: (08870) Sitges - 34V Carrer Pintor Maria Carbonell I Llopis
title_short: (08870) Sitges - 34V Carrer Pintor Maria Carbonell I Llopis

address.street: 34V Carrer Pintor Maria Carbonell I Llopis

title_short: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 11 Carrer de la Ràpita
description: Petromiralles gas station fills   your gas bottle if you have your own adapter, put the adapter in the bottle and leave the bottle in the gas cabinet while the bottle is filled. Today 3 November 2022 LPG 84.9cnt/l and diesel 1.689/l. Very good prices and friendly service.

title: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 129 Avinguda de Tarragona
title_short: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 129 Avinguda de Tarragona
description: Lavanderia, self-service on the diagonal dryer DIA car park opposite the roundabout.

title: (08870) Sitges - Avinguda Camí Pla
description: Very quiet area in the parking lot of the Caprabo supermarket you can spend the night perfectly. You have many supermarkets around, since it is located in an industrial estate about 15 min from the center of Sitges  .

title: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 58 Avinguda Ronda de Mar
title_short: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 58 Avinguda Ronda de Mar
description: Parking strip located directly after the expressway exit. Approved up to 5.5 tons. No extras, but enough space for longer cars. Brightly illuminated. Now and then learner drivers who practice parking. Street is noisy, but it feels safe.

title: (08870) Sitges - 26 Avinguda del Camí Pla
description: Revolution Laundery washer and dryer open 24/7 detached in a parking lot

title: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 1 Carretera Sant Jaume dels Domenys
title_short: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 1 Carretera Sant Jaume dels Domenys
description: Service area with cafeteria and supermarket nearby, possibility of emptying. Automatic laundry 300 m after the petrol station

title: (08870) Sitges - 43 Avinguda Camí Pla 31
description: Outside parking space to wash your mobile home or large vans.

title: (08870) Sitges - 3B Urbanització Aiguadolc i 12
description: Parking on a residential street above the beach. Parking is level in most places but to secure a space you’d need to get here before 07:00 as it’s very busy with locals. Few other campervans parked along this stretch and as long as you’re respectful and quiet, it seems to be tolerated by the local community. Beach is immediately below the street and there are toilets and a beach shower for rinsing off sand and seawater. No other facilities immediately nearby but a short 5 min walk to the center for plenty of shops restaurants etc. Nearest access for black water emptying is near Lidl, about 7 min drive

title: (08870) Sitges - 5 Carrer de la Devesa
description: Land parking lot next to the Carrefour store. During the day there is traffic because people go shopping, but at night it is calm. We are several motorhomes and their owners tell me that there is no problem. The commissioner is nearby. So it looks like a secure area. Small vehicle only

title: (08870) -
description: Motorhome parking, it says that it is paid but there is no parking meter to pay.  It is in the polygon, we spent a quiet night, at 8 in the morning the workers from around us arrived.  There is water.

title: (08870) Sitges - 10 Camí Mas d'en Puig
description: Very large gravel parking lot near the highway. The highway is within earshot. OK for a night in transit. Access is also no problem for large campers. Even. The satellite image is deceptive.

name: Camping Creixell
title: (43839) Camping Creixell
description: Creixell, 3 Carrer Via Augusta. Land with trees, good services, 2 minutes from the beach, very pleasant staff, surveillance, bar, supermarket, various activities, children's park ... family atmosphere

name: Camping Capfun L'Alba
title: (43839) Camping Capfun L'Alba
description: Camping near the beach. Be careful ... Very low trees. It is very difficult to fit the motorhome over 2.50 high.

title: (08870) Sitges - 19 Carrer de la Devesa
description: Ground parking

description:
Laundry, clean and tumble dryer. Payment in cash
Opening hours: 08:00-22:00

title: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 18 Carrer Zamora
title_short: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 18 Carrer Zamora
description: Good place to rest, hidden and respectable.

title: (08870) Sitges - Carrer de la Creu Roja
title_short: (08870) Sitges - Carrer de la Creu Roja
description: Gas station with parking, the little extra is the possibility to add water (the tap is grafted to the inflation station) friendly staff

title: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 2717 Carrer Bodegues Torres
title_short: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 2717 Carrer Bodegues Torres
description: A shaded spot very large area near the swimming pool and a coffee shop toilet facilities and water are available crate overnight stay with no difficulties no parking restrictions and no one seems to care just enjoying life

title_short: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 15P Raval Zona Esportiva
description: Stabilized parking not far from the sports complex and downtown less restrictive than the area of the city center

title: (43718) Marmellar -
description: Old castle with sea view

title: (08870) Sitges - 5 Carrer Surgent
description: A simple park strip next to the street. Not nice, but practical. It is only 5 minutes to Sitges. I stood here one night with no problem. The train tracks run directly behind the parking lot, but there are no trains at night.

title: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 1 Carrer Emporda
title_short: (43717) La Bisbal del Penedès - 1 Carrer Emporda
description: Hermitage of Santa Cristina. A very quiet place (December 31) to spend the night with good views. There is a small area with swings but it is very neglected. At the access there is a small stretch of dirt track, in good condition but narrow, it is not recommended for motorhomes or large vehicles, but in a van without problems.

title: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 2-4 Carrer de Sant Sadurní
title_short: (08720) Vilafranca del Penedès - 2-4 Carrer de Sant Sadurní
description: Laundry with very attentive staff in the morning until 5pm, Washing machines with detergent included drier, Table to fold clothes. Very clean Wifi. Free parking nearby. Mercadona supermarket of 3 minutes,

title: (08870) Sitges - Carrera Barcelona a Calafell
description: Small parking, but you can park a camper or two perfectly, next to it there is a beach that is difficult to access, but it is worth it, tranquility next to Sitges;)

name: Camping La Noria
title: (43830) Camping La Noria
description: Campsite La Noria. The employees are very friendly. Next to the beach with an underpass to save the railway line. Very clean toilets and services such as restaurant, laundry and supermarket. Accept camping ACSI card.

title: (08799) - 2 Masia Cal Sadurni
description: Land parking next to the Hermitage of Sant Pere de Molanta. As parking it is a good option for a stop on the route.

name: Camping Clara
title: (43830) Camping Clara
description: Camping Clara with direct Access to the Beach. Very clean and very new! Everything you need. Little supermarket, bread and croissants in the morning. Warm showers without extra costs. You can also wash your laundry (extra costs). Train passes nearby but it’s very calm and silent.

name: Camping Relaxsol
title: (43830) Camping Relaxsol
description:
Camping Relax Sol
Small Camping, friendly reception, you can choose your place, but close to railway (not suffer from), private passage to the beach. Sanitary outdated but clean, shower lukewarm / hot water, see when you take a shower.
Close to village, shops, bus stop and train station.

title: (43830) Torredembarra - 1 Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Mega space. Free of charge outside of the session and nobody is itchy to stand here. Own access to the beach. Trains and cars are hardly noticeable.

title: (43830) Torredembarra - Carrer del Ferrocarril
description: Large and well-used parking lot near the beach. There are always some mobile homes there. The beach can be reached via a long wooden bridge. At the end of the parking lot is a busy railway line. Due to the concrete wall it is not that loud. Shops and restaurants nearby.

name: Camping plage de Miramar
title: (43830) Camping plage de Miramar
description: Camping Miramar Beach. Very quiet and shady camping, near the town of Torredembarra, 3 minutes walk from the Renfe station, several supermarkets nearby. Beautiful beach 1 minute walk, with many restaurants on the seafront. Pizzería buenísima right next door (Il godfather of Enzo)

title: () Olivella - Camí de Sitges a la Plana Novella
title_short: () Olivella - Camí de Sitges a la Plana Novella
description: Full of nature on a hilly track. No service Magnificent panorama. Suitable for all CC versions. Many mountain bikes.

address.street: Camí de Sitges a la Plana Novella

title: (43714) La Vall de Sant Marc -
description: Small fairly steep path for 100 meters at the level of the pass, maybe the big motorhomes will not be able to pass. There are two places available

title: (08818) Olivella - 14 Carrer Josep Almirall i Marti
title_short: (08818) Olivella - 14 Carrer Josep Almirall i Marti
description: There is a large car park above the village, next to the cemetery. Great view, many hiking opportunities, free parking space, no prohibition signs or similar. Spent a night here to relax and sleep in nature!

title: (08818) Olivella - 2 Calle Sant Isidre
description: Parking 50 meters from a beautiful village stairs with public fountain, a good place to spend a couple of days, although there are no bars or restaurants

title: (08818) Olivella - 2 Carrer de Migjorn
description: Parking in the Garraf Natural Park, in a quiet location, without service. Hiking, mountain biking and visits to monuments

title: (43718) - 31 Avinguda Josep Tarradellas
description: Very quiet place in terms of sports facilities, at the entrance of the village. Drinking water fountain and garbage can. Beautiful view of the vines on the terrace. Very calm. Had a quiet night.

title: (08798) Barcelona - Carretera Nacional 340
description: To wash the camper and do some shopping

title: (08870) Quint Mar - Unnamed Road
description: Perfect for young people on SUNDAY evenings. techno parties held at the Hola Club Sitges. Free entry and a view of the sea… gorgeous! In general, the parking lot is a great EMERGENCY SOLUTION. Big and in the countryside. Unfortunately a lot of rubbish
